--- pagetitle: "KY-Home" title: "Kisung You" about: # see "https://quarto.org/docs/reference/projects/websites.html#about" # for modifying the about section template: trestles image: images/me_twain.jpg image-shape: rounded image-width: 65% links: - text: Google Scholar icon: google url: "https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=JVyf5I8AAAAJ" - text: GitHub icon: github url: "https://github.com/kisungyou" - text: LinkedIn icon: linkedin url: "https://www.linkedin.com/in/kisung-you-b5b23b131/" - text: Twitter icon: twitter url: "https://twitter.com/kisung_you" - text: Email icon: envelope url: "mailto:kisung.you@outlook.com" comments: false format: html: css: styles.css execute: cache: false echo: false engine: knitr --- ::: column-page ### Welcome! I am an assistant professor in the [Department of Mathematics](https://mfeapp.baruch.cuny.edu/math/) at Baruch College, City University of New York and a research affiliate at the Yale School of Medicine. My research integrates tools from statistics, differential geometry, and computational mathematics to develop new methods for complex scientific problems, with a strong focus on biomedical data analysis. I am also passionate about high-performance computing and statistical software development, aiming to make advanced methods practically accessible across disciplines. #### üì∞ News
2025/07/03 New article: Scalable geometric learning with correlation-based functional brain networks is published.
2025/05/27 New preprint on geometric medians on product manifolds is available on arXiv.
2025/05/03 New article: Expert of Experts Verification and Alignment (EVAL) is published.
